settings.heading: Is Daily Core right for me?
settings.content: Daily Core is designed for adults seeking a comprehensive multivitamin to strengthen their immune system and provide essential nutrients for optimum health.

settings.heading: 30-Day Money-Back Guarantee
settings.content: If for any reason you aren’t completely satisfied with your purchase, you may request a refund within 30 days of delivery of your first order — no questions asked!

settings.title: We’ve got your back without the hidden gotchas

settings.text:
Our list of no-gos:

ⓧ DAIRY

ⓧ GLUTEN

ⓧ GMOS

ⓧ SYNTHETIC DYES

ⓧ ARTIFICIAL PRESERVATIVES

ⓧ FILLERS

ⓧ POLYETHYLENE GLYCOL (PEG)

ⓧ MALTODEXTRIN

settings.title: Total Body Vitality
settings.caption: Your body works like a system so your multivitamin should too. Daily Core’s 27 essential nutrients and antioxidants work in tandem to energize your overall well-being, getting all the way down to the cellular level to build up to your best self.

settings.title: Cellular Nutrition
settings.caption: Our cells need proper nutrients and antioxidants to perform a wide variety of functions, like keeping energy up, repairing DNA, lowering inflammation in our body, and maintaining a healthy metabolism. Daily Core is designed to enhance cellular nutrition while reducing oxidative stress, an imbalance that can damage organs and tissues.

settings.title: Immune Boost
settings.caption: A healthy immune system safeguards our well-being, so we want to make sure it’s always operating properly. Daily Core helps strengthen your body’s natural defense system because it’s packed with key nutrients like Extramel®, a powerful antioxidant that helps break down potentially harmful oxygen molecules in cells, helping to protect them from damage.

settings.title: Cognitive Support
settings.caption: When the brain lacks proper nutrients, it can’t meet the demands of everyday life. Attention spans take a hit, and so does memory. Daily Core contains specific nutrients aimed at supporting brain health, including a powerful antioxidant called Extramel™ (SOD B) that’s designed to promote general well-being, reduce stress, and improve mental and physical performance.

settings.title: Alpha-GPC
settings.popup_content:
Alpha-GPC

  • What It Does: Alpha-Glycerylphosphorylcholine (alpha-GPC) has a long name because it's all about being big-brained. This chemical powers up your mental clarity, memory, and focus by helping your brain cells communicate faster and more efficiently.
  • Form: Alpha-Glycerylphosphorylcholine
  • Found In: Egg yolks, meat, fish
  • Country of Origin: Italy
  • Final Location of Manufacturing: USA

settings.title: Biotin
settings.popup_content:
Biotin

  • What It Does: Biotin brings the brawn to your beauty by helping your body metabolize fats, carbs, and proteins, while keeping your hair, skin, and nails looking their best.
  • Form: D-Biotin
  • Found In: Egg yolks, nuts, seeds, fish, sweet potatoes
  • Country of Origin: China
  • Final Location of Manufacturing: USA

settings.title: Boron
settings.popup_content:
Boron

  • What It Does: Boron is anything but boring. It's a great support for bone health, hormone regulation, and cognitive function.
  • Form: Boron Amino Acid Chelate
  • Found In: Fruits (e.g., apples, pears, grapes), nuts, legumes
  • Country of Origin: Ogden, UT USA
  • Final Location of Manufacturing: USA

settings.title: Calcium
settings.popup_content:
Calcium

  • What It Does: Got calcium? This mineral keeps your bones and teeth strong, while regulating muscle contraction and relaxation.
  • Form: Calcium Carbonate
  • Found In: Dairy products (milk, cheese, yogurt), leafy green vegetables (e.g., kale, broccoli), fortified foods
  • Country of Origin: USA
  • Final Location of Manufacturing: USA

settings.title: Chromium
settings.popup_content:
Chromium

  • What It Does: Chromium is the secret weapon for balancing blood sugar levels and improving your body's sensitivity to insulin.
  • Form: Chromium Picolinate
  • Found In: Whole grains, meats, fruits (e.g., apples, bananas), vegetables (e.g., broccoli)
  • Country of Origin: China
  • Final Location of Manufacturing: USA

settings.title: Extramel®
settings.popup_content:
Extramel®

  • What It Does: Extramel® is loaded with antioxidants and the powerful enzyme superoxide dismutase (SOD), which work together to protect your skin and cells from daily damage caused by the sun, stress, and pollution
  • Form: (SOD B) Melon Juice Extract
  • Found In: Cantaloupe melon, particularly the rind
  • Country of Origin: France
  • Final Location of Manufacturing: USA

settings.title: Folate
settings.popup_content:
Folate

  • What It Does: Folate works behind the scenes to make sure your body runs smoothly. It’s the vitamin that helps build and repair your DNA and supports your red blood cells. And if you're expecting, it'll even play a key role in your baby's development.
  • Form: L-5 MethylTetrahydrofolate
  • Found In: Leafy green vegetables (e.g., spinach, kale), legumes, citrus fruits, whole grains
  • Country of Origin: China
  • Final Location of Manufacturing: USA

settings.title: Inositol
settings.popup_content:
Inositol

  • What It Does: When someone tells you to take a chill pill, they're likely referring to inositol. This sugar helps balance your mood and hormones, manage anxiety, and support your overall mental health.
  • Form: Inositol
  • Found In: Citrus fruits, beans, nuts, grains
  • Country of Origin: China
  • Final Location of Manufacturing: USA

settings.title: Iodine
settings.popup_content:
Iodine

  • What It Does: Iodine is your thyroid's best friend. This essential mineral helps produce the thyroid hormones that control metabolism, energy, growth, and even mood.
  • Form: Potassium Iodide
  • Found In: Iodized salt, seaweed, dairy products, seafood
  • Country of Origin: Salt Lake City, UT USA
  • Final Location of Manufacturing: USA

settings.title: Lutein
settings.popup_content:
Lutein

  • What It Does: Keep your eyes clear and focused with lutein. It’s a powerful antioxidant that helps your vision stay sharp and vibrant, while blocking out harmful light and preventing gradual vision loss.
  • Form: Lutein
  • Found In: Dark leafy greens (e.g., spinach, kale), egg yolks, corn, yellow-orange fruits and vegetables
  • Country of Origin: China
  • Final Location of Manufacturing: USA

settings.title: Magnesium Aspartate
settings.popup_content:
Magnesium Aspartate

  • What It Does: Your body needs magnesium for over 300 vital reactions, making it the ultimate multitasker. It helps with maintaining muscle and nerve function, strengthening bones, and steadying your heartbeat. Plus, it can keep your hormones balanced, metabolism regulated, and energy up.
  • Form: Magnesium Aspartate
  • Found In: Lentils, green leafy vegetables (e.g., spinach), pumpkin seeds, almonds
  • Country of Origin: USA
  • Final Location of Manufacturing: USA

settings.title: Molybdenum
settings.popup_content:
Molybdenum

  • What It Does: Detox your body with molybdenum, a mineral your body needs to help enzymes break down and process harmful substances, like sulfur-containing amino acids and certain toxins.
  • Form: Molybdenum Amino Acid Chelate
  • Found In: Legumes, grains, some vegetables (e.g., peas, beans)
  • Country of Origin: Ogden, UT USA
  • Final Location of Manufacturing: USA

settings.title: Potassium
settings.popup_content:
Potassium

  • What It Does: Potassium is a powerhouse electrolyte that keeps everything flowing smoothly — balancing fluids, supporting muscle function, and keeping your nerves in check.
  • Form: Potassium Phosphate
  • Found In: Bananas, potatoes, spinach, tomatoes, beans
  • Country of Origin: Salt Lake City, UT USA
  • Final Location of Manufacturing: USA

settings.title: Selenium
settings.popup_content:
Selenium

  • What It Does: Selenium is a small-but-mighty antioxidant that supports your immune system and helps protect your cells from oxidative damage caused by everyday stress and environmental toxins.
  • Form: Selenomethionine
  • Found In: Brazil nuts, seafood, organ meats (e.g., liver)
  • Country of Origin: India
  • Final Location of Manufacturing: USA

settings.title: Tocotrienol Complex
settings.popup_content:
Tocotrienol Complex

  • What It Does: Tocotrienol Complex is vitamin E, but better. This complex works to support your health and cognitive function, while keeping your skin glowing and inflammation under control.
  • Form: Containing mixed d-alpha-Tocotrienol, d-beta-Tocotrienol, d-gamma-Tocotrienol, d-delta-Tocotrienol
  • Found In: Rice bran oil, palm oil, barley, oats
  • Country of Origin: Malaysia/Indonesia
  • Final Location of Manufacturing: USA

settings.title: Vitamin A
settings.popup_content:
Vitamin A

  • What It Does: Vitamin A is the key to acing your next eye doctor and dermatologist appointments. It helps maintain healthy vision, skin, and immune function.
  • Form: Retinyl Palmitate
  • Found In: Liver, fish oils, orange/yellow vegetables (e.g., carrots, sweet potatoes)
  • Country of Origin: China
  • Final Location of Manufacturing: USA

settings.title: Vitamin B1
settings.popup_content:
Vitamin B1

  • What It Does: Vitamin B1 will be the one to keep you going all day long. It helps your body metabolize food into fuel, giving your brain, muscles, and nerves the energy they need.
  • Form: Thiamine HCl
  • Found In: Whole grains, legumes, nuts, seeds
  • Country of Origin: China
  • Final Location of Manufacturing: USA

settings.title: Vitamin B2
settings.popup_content:
Vitamin B2

  • What It Does: Glow up with vitamin B2. Also known as riboflavin, this vitamin aids your metabolism while maintaining healthy skin, eyes, and nerves so you can stay vibrant and energized.
  • Form: Riboflavin
  • Found In: Dairy products, eggs, lean meats, green leafy vegetables
  • Country of Origin: Hubei Province, China
  • Final Location of Manufacturing: USA

settings.title: Vitamin B3
settings.popup_content:
Vitamin B3

  • What It Does: Niacinamide is a skin savior — it brightens your complexion, reduces redness, and evens out skin tone, all while supporting your skin's natural barrier to lock in moisture and keep irritants out.
  • Form: Niacinamide
  • Found In: Poultry, fish, whole grains, peanuts
  • Country of Origin: India
  • Final Location of Manufacturing: USA

settings.title: Vitamin B5
settings.popup_content:
Vitamin B5

  • What It Does: Vitamin B5 keeps you buzzing all day long by turning the food you eat into energy and supporting your adrenal glands in managing stress. It also promotes glowing skin, so you feel great inside and out.
  • Form: d-Calcium Pantothenate
  • Found In: Eggs, fish, poultry, whole grains
  • Country of Origin: China
  • Final Location of Manufacturing: USA

settings.title: Vitamin B6
settings.popup_content:
Vitamin B6

  • What It Does: Find your balance with vitamin B6. This essential nutrient helps you regulate your mood and reduce stress. Plus, it helps produce neurotransmitters like serotonin and dopamine, which help you maintain emotional and psychological balance.
  • Form: Pyridoxal-5-Phosphate
  • Found In: Poultry, fish, potatoes, non-citrus fruits
  • Country of Origin: China
  • Final Location of Manufacturing: USA

settings.title: Vitamin B12
settings.popup_content:
Vitamin B12

  • What It Does: Vitamin B12 keeps your brain sharp, your nerves and metabolism in check, and your red blood cells running smoothly, so your body can stay fired up and ready to go.
  • Form: Methylcobalamin
  • Found In: Animal products like fish, meat, eggs, dairy
  • Country of Origin: China
  • Final Location of Manufacturing: USA

settings.title: Vitamin C
settings.popup_content:
Vitamin C

  • What It Does: Stay in tip-top shape with vitamin C. Known for its antioxidant properties, this vitamin boosts immunity and helps you fight off infection. It's also crucial for collagen production, which supports tissue repair, helps firm skin, reduce wrinkles, and keep joints flexible.
  • Form: Ascorbic Acid
  • Found In: Citrus fruits, strawberries, bell peppers, broccoli
  • Country of Origin: China
  • Final Location of Manufacturing: USA

settings.title: Vitamin D3
settings.popup_content:
Vitamin D3

  • What It Does: Even when the sun's not out, vitamin D3 brings its benefits to you. This vitamin boosts everything from your energy to your emotional well-being — all while supporting your immune system and helping your bones stay strong.
  • Form: Cholecalciferol
  • Found In: Fatty fish (e.g., salmon, mackerel), egg yolks, fortified dairy products
  • Country of Origin: Fujian Province, China
  • Final Location of Manufacturing: USA

settings.title: Vitamin E
settings.popup_content:
Vitamin E

  • What It Does: Boost your beauty and wellness with vitamin E. As a powerful antioxidant, it helps protect your cells from damage while enhancing your skin's glow. It also supports your immune system and promotes heart health.
  • Form: d-alpha-Tocopherol
  • Found In: Nuts, seeds, vegetable oils, leafy green vegetables
  • Country of Origin: 
  • Final Location of Manufacturing: USA

settings.title: Vitamin K1
settings.popup_content:
Vitamin K1

  • What It Does: Vitamin K1 is what you need to stop the bleed. This vitamin makes sure your blood clots correctly, preventing excessive bleeding when you get scraped up. It's also a powerful ally to calcium in keeping your bones strong and healthy.
  • Form: Phylloquinone
  • Found In: Green leafy vegetables (e.g., kale, spinach, broccoli)
  • Country of Origin: Anhui Province, China
  • Final Location of Manufacturing: USA

settings.title: Zinc
settings.popup_content:
Zinc

  • What It Does: Zinc keeps your body in sync by supporting your immune and nervous systems while aiding in cellular repair and protein synthesis. It even helps speed up the healing process after an injury.
  • Form: Zinc Amino Acid Chelate
  • Found In: Meat, shellfish, legumes, seeds, nuts
  • Country of Origin: Ogden, UT USA
  • Final Location of Manufacturing: USA

settings.heading: Daily Core vs Other Multivitamins
settings.text:
Not all multivitamins are built the same.

Here’s how Bioligent stacks up.

settings.heading: Save up to 25% off when you build a bundle

settings.question: Who is Daily Core for?
settings.answer: Daily Core is designed for adults seeking a comprehensive multivitamin to strengthen their immune system and provide essential nutrients for optimum health.

settings.question: Why should I be taking a multivitamin?
settings.answer: Daily Core is more than a multivitamin; it’s a multimineral that helps make up for essential nutrients that have been stripped from our food. Taking Daily Core is a great way to give your body what it needs to stay healthy and energized.

settings.question: Why do some ingredients have more than 100% of the recommended daily value?
settings.answer: Taking a multivitamin with over 100% of the daily values is typically not going to hurt you. The recommended daily values are designed to prevent deficiency, but they may not be enough to meet the increased needs due to factors like stress, lifestyle, and nutrient depletion in food sources. A lot of us are deficient in key vitamins and minerals, so a high-quality, comprehensive supplement can help ensure your body gets the proper nutrients it needs to maintain optimal health.

settings.question: Why is the serving size four capsules? Isn’t one enough?
settings.answer: We believe one capsule isn’t enough to pack in all of the nutrients your body needs for an entire day, but with four capsules, we’re able to get you the quality ingredients and daily values needed for optimal health. Also, you can choose how you take them: all at once, or two capsules twice daily.

settings.question: What sets Daily Core apart from other multivitamins?
settings.answer: Daily Core is a comprehensive, clean-sourced blend of active vitamins and minerals that are highly bioavailable — meaning that your body can best absorb the nutrients and actually feel their benefits. Daily Core also includes essential immune-enhancing ingredients called antioxidants for an added health boost, while being free of dyes, fillers, and other hidden gotchas.

settings.question: How can I be sure Daily Core is high-quality and safe?
settings.answer:
At Bioligent, our products undergo rigorous testing through trusted third-party labs to meet our high standards for safety and quality. We always make sure to test for: 

• Ingredient Integrity: We verify that the amount and potency of each ingredient listed on our labels are accurate.

• Heavy Metals: We screen for harmful contaminants including lead, mercury, and other toxic metals.

• Product Purity: We check for potential impurities like E. Coli, yeast, and mold, and certify that our ingredients are gluten-free, dairy-free, organic, if applicable, and non-GMO before going into production. 

• Glyphosates: We ensure that our products are free from harmful pesticides.

settings.text:
I’ve spent a lifetime trying to find solutions for several health issues — asthma, depression, migraines, hormonal imbalances, you name it. So, I opened a private practice specializing in neuroscience and neuronutrition to improve lives through nutritional and natural ways of healing.

But over the last 30+ years, new stressors and environmental toxins have harmed my patients’ health — and it’s been increasingly difficult to find trustworthy formulas that meet their needs. 

Bioligent was the obvious next step. Here, we create natural supplements with intentional, clean-sourced ingredients, backed by science you can trust — giving you the power to combat oxidative stress and overcome your body’s innate limitations.

Janay Standifird & Gina Stevenson sought to create an integrity-first company with exceptionally made products without the “gotcha” ingredients often found in the marketplace today.

Bioligent is proudly a privately held, female owned and led company based in Idaho.
